oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Remarks concerning copies of Bushman Paintings, given by Colonel Durnfold to His Excellency Sir Bartle Frere. By /han=kass'o (L VIII.-22. 7969-7972, 7974 and 7975, 7983-7993, 23. 7995-8004). |han=kass'o describes and explains copies of rock paintings (no.'s 5-7). 1) pp.7992v-7993v: different buck and their horns, 2) See also Notes on rock painting copy no. 3 and Notes on rock painting copy no. 2 (!nu'sa and other groups), 3) This story is found in Book VIII-22.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Notes on rock painting copy no. 5, no. 6. and no. 7
